mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRCE_PRODUCT_INFO_HISTORY ( GOOD_ID, COMMODITY_CODE, COMMODITY_NAME, LGCS_AREA_CODE, LGCS_AREA_NAME, SALE_STATUS_ID, SALE_STATUS_CODE, SALE_STATUS_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, CLASSES_CODE, CLASSES_NAME, MACHINING_CODE, MACHINING_NAME, BREED_CODE, BREED_NAME, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, BRAND_CODE, BRAND_NAME, QUALITY_GRADE_TYPE_CODE, QUALITY_GRADE_TYPE_NAME, GROSS_WEIGHT, NET_WEIGHT, PACKAGE_SPECIFICATION, PACKAGE_QUANTITY, CARTON_DIMENSION, BRAND_ITEM_PROPERTY_SKU, SHELF_STU, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, VERSION )SELECT GOOD_ID, COMMODITY_CODE, COMMODITY_NAME, LGCS_AREA_CODE, LGCS_AREA_NAME, SALE_STATUS_ID, SALE_STATUS_CODE, SALE_STATUS_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, CLASSES_CODE, CLASSES_NAME, MACHINING_CODE, MACHINING_NAME, BREED_CODE, BREED_NAME, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, BRAND_CODE, BRAND_NAME, QUALITY_GRADE_TYPE_CODE, QUALITY_GRADE_TYPE_NAME, GROSS_WEIGHT, NET_WEIGHT, PACKAGE_SPECIFICATION, PACKAGE_QUANTITY, CARTON_DIMENSION, BRAND_ITEM_PROPERTY_SKU, SHELF_STU, 0, #{updId}, #{updTime}, 1 FROM PRCE_PRODUCT_INFO
